sponsor: Durata Therapeutics Inc., an affiliate of Allergan plc
briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Dalbavancin for the Treatment of Acute Bacterial Skin and Skin Structure Infections
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double-Blind, Double-Dummy Study to Compare the Efficacy and Safety of Dalbavancin to a Comparator Regimen (Vancomycin and Linezolid) for the Treatment of Acute Bacterial Skin and Skin Structure Infections

arms.label: Vancomycin with possible switch to oral linezolid

summary: The primary object is to compare the early clinical efficacy (after 48-72 hours of therapy) of dalbavancin to the comparator regimen (vancomycin with the option to switch to oral linezolid) for the treatment of patients with a suspected or proved gram-positive bacterial skin or skin structure infections.

effectByArm.arm: Vancomycin With Possible Switch to Oral Linezolid
